TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Glyph extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 代表由 管理的單一使用者介面 (UI) 實體 (Entity)。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 其開發目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>是繪製，並點擊測試。 A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>沒有視窗控制代碼 (HWND)，所呈現的樣式的裝飾項視窗控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。 每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>可以有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>與其相關聯。 已成功接受點擊測試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>有機會在推送新的或不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>入行為堆疊的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 行為服務概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立您自己<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>基礎類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>與其相關聯。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

Docs.related: 如何：在設計模式中擴充控制項的外觀和行為

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.Cursor GetHitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point p) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetHitTest (p As Point) As Cursor

Docs.returns: 如果 與 相關聯，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A>方式`abstract`方法，強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>實作提供點擊的測試邏輯。 指定任何時間點，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>決定將會牽涉到與該位置，它必須傳回有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>。 否則傳回`null`會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>要略過的位置。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A>點是否在此圖像 （glyph）。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

Docs.related: 如何：在設計模式中擴充控制項的外觀和行為

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Paint(class System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs pe) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Paint (pe As PaintEventArgs)

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A>方式`abstract`方法，強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>實作提供繪製邏輯。 `pe`參數會包含<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>與 裝飾項視窗<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A>繪製圖像 （glyph）。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>類別。
